segments.text: Hey , Ted . What are you up to this Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have the day off from work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great ! Do you have any plans ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ Ve been working so hard lately , so I ’ ll probably just take it easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I ’ ll probably just stay in and relax . Maybe watch a few movies .
segments.speaker: S2
